text:
Question 127) (Plate Translation: “Don't forget when I am an important name.”) Nazareth, P. Arts / Bananas Market. Miami Art Basel, USA, 2011.
The contemporaneity identified in the performance / installation of miner artist Paulo Nazareth lies mainly in the way he
A) Rescues known references of Mineiro modernism.
B) uses traditional techniques and supports in the construction of shapes.
C) Articulates questions of identity, territory and language codes.
D) mimics the role of celebrities in the contemporary world.
E) Camufla the plastic aspect and visual composition of your assembly.
